</image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;c1c2d7e2.1503">   <title>Job (London): Research and Postgraduate Development Manager, British Library </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;c1c2d7e2.1503</link>   <description> Research and Postgraduate Development Manager<br>Salary is \ufffd\ufffd38,891 per annum<br>Full time; Permanent<br>The British Library, St Pancras, London<br><br>This is an exciting new role for an experienced research manager to join an innovative, dynamic team to shape and deliver the British Library's future research strategy. Working closely with senior staff across the Library, you will be responsible for management and delivery of the Library\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds postgraduate and early career research training programme, and play a key role in research funding and strategy development. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-10T14:38:01+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Allan Sudlow</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;c1c2d7e2.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;cafc4e30.1503">   <title>Job opening - Medical Research Council Science Manager for Methodology and Clinical Research </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;cafc4e30.1503</link>   <description> http://www.nature.com/naturejobs/science/jobs/508789-science-manager-for-methodology-and-clinical-research<br><br>The Science Manager for Methodology and Clinical Research will participate in development of MRC strategy and delivery of funding competitions which support research into new methodologies for biomedical and healthcare research, and studies in clinical settings. The post holder will liaise with academic applicants, support peer review and oversee delivery of funding through the MRC-NIHR Methodology Research Programme panel, and will be involved with delivery of other strategic and funding activities e.g. in the fields of experimental and stratified medicine.   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-10T11:26:37+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>David Crosby</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;cafc4e30.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;847687a2.1503">   <title>Research and Postgraduate Development Manager vacancy at the British Library </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;847687a2.1503</link>   <description> Research and Postgraduate Development Manager vacancy at the British Library<br>Location:LondonSalary:\ufffd\ufffd38,891 per annumHours:Full TimeContract Type:<br>Permanent<br><br>Placed on:10th March 2015Closes:26th March 2015Job Ref:COL00139<br><br>This is an exciting new role for an experienced research manager to join an<br>innovative, dynamic team to shape and deliver the British Library's future<br>research strategy.<br><br>Working closely with senior staff across the Library, you will be<br>responsible for management and delivery of the Library\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds postgraduate and<br>early career research training programme, and play a key role in research<br>funding and strategy development. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-10T14:37:48+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Lorna Colquhoun</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;847687a2.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;22b8e28.1503">   <title>Job Opening - Research Office, The University of Auckland, New Zealand </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;22b8e28.1503</link>   <description> Dear Research Management and Administration Colleagues,<br><br>We have a job opportunity in the Research Office at the University of Auckland for a Business Growth Advisor (BGA) (Job Opening 17011) in our Income Growth and Research Analytics Services Team that we would like to advertise to ARMA colleagues. There are five BGA positions in this team and each has a particular specialism; the specialism for this job opening is the Social Sciences. All applications must be submitted through the University of Auckland &quot;Careers at Auckland&quot; link: https://www.auckland.ac.nz/en/about/careers-at-auckland.html [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-03-06T05:00:09+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Lyn Clark</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;22b8e28.1503</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;dd69d6b6.1502">   <title>Short courses: Basic Statistics and Regression Analysis at the Statistical Services Centre, University of Reading, UK (February 2015) </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;dd69d6b6.1502</link>   <description> Apologies for cross posting.<br><br>Please note these courses are taking place as planned ...<br><br>We are re-announcing two short courses which are scheduled to take place at the Statistical Services Centre in February 2015. Summary information is given below. For more detailed information and registration forms please see http://www.reading.ac.uk/ssc/, or email statistics-courses@lists.reading.ac.uk&lt;mailto:statistics-courses@lists.reading.ac.uk&gt;. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-13T16:51:39+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kimberley Hulme</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;dd69d6b6.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;80183bbe.1502">   <title>FW: Research Development Officers (Research Facilitator) jobs at the University of Birmingham </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;80183bbe.1502</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues<br><br>Research Development Officers (Research Facilitators) at the University of Birmingham - 2 posts supporting the Colleges of Arts and Law and Social Sciences<br>Salary range \ufffd\ufffd28,695 to \ufffd\ufffd37,394<br>Closing date Sunday 22nd February 2015.<br><br>The University of Birmingham is seeking to recruit two self-motivated research development professionals with a strong commitment to customer service to support the delivery of ambitious targets for research funding capture in the Colleges of Arts and Law and Social Sciences at the University of Birmingham. The posts will be an integral part of the research support dedicated to the College of Arts and [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-13T12:52:23+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Stephen Taylor (Research and Innovation Services)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;80183bbe.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;e11c8446.1502">   <title>VACANCY: Research Development Manager - University of Oxford Research Services </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;e11c8446.1502</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>The information below is in relation to a vacancy for a Research Development Manager in the Research Services Science Area Team at the University of Oxford.<br><br>Kind regards,<br>Dan<br><br>Dr Dan Blakey<br>Deputy Head of Research Services (Science Area) | Research Services<br>University of Oxford<br>Robert Hooke Building, Oxford<br>OX1 3PR, UK<br>Tel: +44 (0)1865 616514 | daniel.blakey@admin.ox.ac.uk<br>www.admin.ox.ac.uk/researchsupport [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-04T17:03:11+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Daniel Blakey</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;e11c8446.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;6a67a2a1.1502">   <title>MARCH FORUM EVENT: Widening Participation in Postgraduate Study , Central London, 26 March 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;6a67a2a1.1502</link>   <description> ****APOLOGIES FOR ANY CROSS POSTING****<br><br>Dear Colleague,<br><br>We are delighted to bring you details of our next forum, which we are now<br>taking bookings for.<br><br>March Postgraduate Marketing Forum: 26 March 2015, Central London<br>THEME: Widening Participation in Postgraduate Study<br><br>The increasing national focus on widening participation in postgraduate<br>study is very welcome and has given rise to a wide variety of questions to<br>discuss, and to different areas of activity to develop. How do we define<br>widening participation for postgraduate study, and which students as<br>individuals or groups might be included within this term? How do we decide<br>who [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-02T14:32:10-00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Claire Gascoigne</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;6a67a2a1.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;883d1ad3.1502">   <title>Research Data Manager Vacancy at University of Sheffield, permanent role </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;883d1ad3.1502</link>   <description> Please do let me know of any queries if you are interested in applying for this vacancy. Best wishes, Deborah<br><br>The University of Sheffield Library is currently recruiting to the post of Research Data Manager:<br><br>Job Reference Number: UOS010037<br><br>Salary: Grade 8<br>\ufffd\ufffd38,511 to \ufffd\ufffd45,954 per annum with the potential to progress to \ufffd\ufffd51,702 per annum through sustained exceptional contribution. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-30T11:12:46+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Deborah McClean</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;883d1ad3.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;7924bf8d.1501">   <title>Ethics and Research Governance Manager, Manchester Metropolitan University </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;7924bf8d.1501</link>   <description> Dear All,<br><br>We have a vacancy for an Ethics and Research Governance Manager based at the All Saints (Manchester) Campus of MMU.<br><br>Contract: Permanent<br>Salary: \ufffd\ufffd33,242 to \ufffd\ufffd38,511<br>Deadline: 4 February 2015<br><br>Please see the full details including the job description here: bit.ly/1yShoHX<br><br>Best wishes,<br>Helen<br><br>Helen Lusty | Research Development Administrator | Research and Knowledge Exchange (RKE) | G12 Ormond Building | Manchester Metropolitan University | Lower Ormond Street, Manchester, M15 6BX | Tel. +44 (0) 161 247 1059 |Email h.lusty@mmu.ac.uk&lt;mailto:h.lusty@mmu.ac.uk&gt; [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-26T10:07:13+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Helen Lusty</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;7924bf8d.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;55cd3744.1501">   <title>Research data spring successful ideas </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;55cd3744.1501</link>   <description> Hi all,<br><br>Research data spring is our collaborative initiative for UK research. Its purpose is to gather fresh ideas for new solutions to ease the pain points in research data management, improve the much needed software and standards, and prototype new shared services.<br><br>With the competition closing on 12 January, our first phase of gathering ideas online for new innovations and solutions saw a high rate of participation. Approximately 600 researchers, librarians, publishers, developers and other third parties posted 70 ideas and more than 150 comments on our community within IdeaScale: http://researchatrisk.ideascale.com/ [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-23T14:53:42+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Daniela Duca</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;55cd3744.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;a4a65bad.1501">   <title>Impact Support Officer, Lancaster University </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;a4a65bad.1501</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>We are recruiting for an Impact Support Officer (Science and Technology) at Lancaster University. Salary \ufffd\ufffd32,277 to \ufffd\ufffd37,394, closing date Friday 20 February 2015.<br><br>For more details please see: http://hr-jobs.lancs.ac.uk/Vacancy.aspx?ref=A1140<br><br>Many thanks,<br><br>Sarah Sweeney<br><br>Dr Sarah Sweeney<br>Senior Faculty Administrator (Science and Technology)<br>Engineering Building<br>Lancaster University<br>Lancaster LA1 4YW<br><br>E-mail: s.sweeney1@lancaster.ac.uk&lt;mailto:s.sweeney1@lancaster.ac.uk&gt;<br>Tel: 01524 594630    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-22T14:55:35+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Sweeney, Sarah</dc:creator> University's Research &amp; Enterprise Office are currently advertising for the following position:<br><br>Project Administrator - ESRC Impact Acceleration 2015) then please contact me on steph.dolben@bangor.ac.uk&lt;mailto:steph.dolben@bangor.ac.uk&gt;<br><br>Steph<br><br>Rheolwr Effaith ac RCUK | Impact and RCUK Manager<br>Swyddfa Ymchwil a Menter | Research and Enterprise Office<br>Y Ganolfan Rheolaeth | The Management Centre<br>Prifysgol Bangor | Bangor University<br>Bangor, Gwynedd, LL57 2DG<br>Cymru, DU | Wales, UK [...]    </description> <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;565632be.1501">   <title>Research Development Officer and Post Award Manager </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;565632be.1501</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>The University of Brighton currently has two vacancies in the Research Office.<br><br>Post Award Manager<br>https://jobs.brighton.ac.uk/vacancy.aspx?ref=EG5084-14-140<br><br>Research Development Officer<br>https://jobs.brighton.ac.uk/Vacancy.aspx?id=763&amp;forced=1<br><br>If colleagues would like more information on either post, then please feel free to contact me on i.pugh@brighton.ac.uk<br><br>Ingrid<br><br>Ingrid Pugh<br>Head of the Research Office<br>University of Brighton<br>01273 642612<br><br>Follow us: @UoB_RO    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-16T13:20:41+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Ingrid Pugh</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;565632be.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;c4e4cbf1.1501">   <title>Health Foundation programme: Funding available for innovations to improve health care </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;c4e4cbf1.1501</link>   <description> Dear Colleague,<br><br>The Health Foundation is launching its Innovating for Improvement programme on Tuesday 13 January.<br>We would be very grateful if you could add a link to the programme with some information about it in your newsletter, bulletin or on your website to make your audiences aware of this new programme.<br>Applications for funding closes on 10 February 2015. I would also be grateful if you could confirm if you intend to circulate this programme information. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-08T16:53:24+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Catherine Riedel</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;c4e4cbf1.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;ab772368.1501">   <title>FINAL PLACES AVAILABLE - January Postgraduate Marketing Forum: Working together to Maximise PG marketing and Conversion - everybody's problem, everybody's solution </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;ab772368.1501</link>   <description> ****APOLOGIES FOR ANY CROSS POSTING****<br><br>Dear Colleague,<br><br>This is a final reminder of our January Postgraduate Marketing Forum. We now<br>have only limited places available so booking at your earliest convenience<br>is recommended if you would like to attend. If you have already booked a<br>place, you will receive your joining instructions at the end of next week. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-06T12:10:39-00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Claire Gascoigne</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;ab772368.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;ddb100fd.1501">   <title>Post Award Manager </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;ddb100fd.1501</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>The University of Brighton is looking to appoint a Post Award Manager. This senior role, based in the Research Office at our Moulsecoomb campus, will manage our new team of Project Managers who are responsible for projects with a total budget of over 25 million Euro. You will develop, manage and monitor the university's structures, policies and procedures for post-award grant management and support and provide professional and expert advice on university and external funder policies, particularly in relation to EU grants. Co-ordinating the work of other staff across the university who have a remit for post-award support [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-05T16:49:34+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Ingrid Pugh</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;ddb100fd.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;cdb0d3fa.1501">   <title>[Job] Community Engagement Manager </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;cdb0d3fa.1501</link>   <description> Dear all,<br><br>I just wanted to alert colleagues to a very exciting opportunity here at Warwick. We are enhancing our work with our academic communities and have just advertised a Community Engagement Manager post to develop services for our postgraduate communities, going beyond our traditional offer. This strategically crucial works very closely with senior colleagues across the University. We are looking for a dynamic individual to take on this hugely important role. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-05T16:30:28+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Evans, Thomas</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;cdb0d3fa.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;1736172d.1501">   <title>UK Data Service rolling programme of webinars </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;1736172d.1501</link>   <description> The UK Data Service is rolling out a programme of 26 regular webinars throughout the year. These will cover a collection of 14 core topics. A flyer listing the topics and dates is available at http://ukdataservice.ac.uk/media/455322/core-webinars-2015.pdf.<br>Webinars are online seminars which are free and easy to join without the expense and trouble of travel any further than to your own computer. There is also an opportunity to ask questions.<br>To book or to find out more about our wider programme of outreach and training events, including our specialist and one-off webinars, please go to http://ukdataservice.ac.uk/news-and-events/events<br>Join us online in January/February: [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-05T08:36:28+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Gillian Meadows</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;1736172d.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;5666c889.1412">   <title>Research administrators and managers - volunteers wanted for research project in the area of research administration </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;5666c889.1412</link>   <description> Dear all<br><br>Apologies for cross-posting - and to those of you who may have received this request at the pilot stage.<br><br>I'm seeking volunteers to participate in my MBA research project which aims to identify the process design principles which are most effective in improving efficiency and productivity in the context of research administration within higher education institutions. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-17T11:34:39+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Mulhearn, Susan</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;5666c889.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;6afc3cc3.1412">   <title>Altmetric Top 100 most shared articles of 2014 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;6afc3cc3.1412</link>   <description> Dear Colleagues,<br><br>The Altmetric Top 100 of 2014 is here!<br><br>As the year draws to a close, we've taken a look back through the Altmetric database to identify which research articles received the most attention online over the last 12 months.<br><br>From studies on the speed of chocolate consumption on hospital wards, to new evidence establishing the origins of the recent Ebola outbreak, the list features quite a mixture of research from around the world. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-09T11:46:03+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Cat Chimes</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;6afc3cc3.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;14c2e5db.1412">   <title>Courses running Feb-June 2015 at the SSC </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;14c2e5db.1412</link>   <description> We are announcing the following short courses, which are scheduled to take place at the Statistical Services Centre between February and June 2015. Summary information is given below. For more detailed information and registration forms please see http://www.reading.ac.uk/ssc/, or email statistics-courses@lists.reading.ac.uk&lt;mailto:statistics-courses@lists.reading.ac.uk&gt;.<br><br>Note<br>******All of our courses include hands-on computer practical work****** ******We also provide consultancy advice and bespoke training****** [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-16T09:49:13+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kimberley Hulme</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;14c2e5db.1412</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;7cd9482f.1412">   <title>RDM readiness workshop, 13th Feb 2015, London </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;7cd9482f.1412</link>   <description> ******Apologies for cross-posting*********<br><br>The DCC is pleased to collaborate with Jisc on a workshop to consider what challenges remain in meeting the EPSRC policy framework, and what lessons can be learned from other institutions.<br><br>The workshop will take place on Friday 13th February in London, directly after the IDCC conference. It is part of Jisc's Research at Risk&lt;http://researchdata.jiscinvolve.org/wp/2014/10/26/research-at-risk-research-data-management-where-are-we-now&gt; co-design challenge and will be free to attend. [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-12-15T15:28:23+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Sarah Jones (HATII)</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ARMA;7cd9482f.1412</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
